primaryFunction: Troubleshoot hardware issues, assist with LMS logins, and manage software installation requests

decisionsMadeBySystem: Categorizes issues (Hardware, Software, Network, or Account)
Determines if an issue can be solved via self-service or needs a ticket
actionsExecutedAutomatically: Generates IT support tickets in Jira/ServiceNow
Provides links to knowledge base articles and tutorial videos
actionsRequiringHumanApproval: Hardware replacements or laptop loaner distribution
Network-wide permission changes or security overrides

scaleAndReach.frequencyOfUse: High volume during start of semester and exam periods

howErrorsAreDetected: System fails to resolve the user's technical error code
whenHumansAreInvolved: Physical hardware damage (broken screens, liquid spills)
Complex network connectivity issues affecting entire classrooms
fallbackBehaviour: Provide the IT Helpdesk walk-in hours and physical location
